title: The Allman Brothers Band - Recorded Live At The 2007 New Orleans
description:
Inofficial soundboard recording - very good quality!!!


The Allman Brothers Band performing some unusual cover songs - 'Gilded Splinters' (Humble Pie), 'Into The Mystic' (Van Morrison) and 'The Weight' (The Band)

cover & logfile included
